input: user: An intimate café in a snowy European village at night, with steamy windows looking out onto cobblestone streets to highlight warmth and enchantment.
output: An intimate café nestled within a snow-blanketed European village glows warmly under a starlit sky. Its window panes are fogged with swirling steam showcasing the charming cobblestone streets beyond. The scene is bathed in the soft, golden light of gas lamps adorning the streetlamps, casting long shadows on the freshly fallen snow. Capture the comforting aroma of hot chocolate and the gentle murmur of conversation within the café, creating a feeling of cozy intimacy and enchanting wonder.
complianceText:

It details the subjects (intimate café, snow-blanketed village, starlit sky), emphasizes timing and lighting (glows warmly under a starlit sky, soft golden light of gas lamps), describes the background (charming cobblestone streets, freshly fallen snow), and conveys the desired feeling (cozy intimacy and enchanting wonder).
